channel.title: Need help plz needin some one thats good at makin servers!
channel.description: I have done everything that the guides say to do. but my server still not up i have downloaded everything needed to make a server i have already added port 43594 to my firewall and i have already port fowarded. i have done the www.no-ip.com registration thing i have already added the host thing and my internet ip but my server goes on but only for me no one else can come in.is it because i have a LAN network?

item.title: Need help plz needin some one thats good at makin servers!
item.dc:creator: @tor_wakui tor wakui
item.description:
@tor_wakui wrote:

but if i use local host its only going to be me on my server i want my server to be up for people to play on

item.title: Need help plz needin some one thats good at makin servers!
item.dc:creator: @Threatening Threatening
item.description:
@Threatening wrote:

tor wakui:

ok at the moment i turned firewall of so that means i skip the addinport to firewall part that says in the guide rite? now i have port forward but it doesnt ask for an ip adress wen i port foward in the guide it says to give name ip adress tcp ports and udp ports i put 43594 for all of thoseand the no-ip thing is good i went on usin my no-ip name but no one else can go in y?

if you need help im not very good but you can use www.portforward.com for information…
